Award.AwardTitle: Conference : 2009 Molecular Pharmacology Gordon Research Conference to be held May 31- June 5, 2009 in Ciocco, Italy

Division.LongName: Div Of Molecular and Cellular Bioscience

Award.AbstractNarration: The award is to support the Molecular Pharmacology Gordon Research Conference, to be held 31 May-5 June, 2009 in II Ciocco, Italy. This conference combines a number of disciplines, particularly in the Neurosciences, centered around cellular signal transduction--particularly through G proteins and G protein coupled receptors. An international cadre of speakers and discussion leaders has been assembled for a highly interactive week-long conference. Participation from junior researchers is particularly encouraged, and funds from this award will defray some of the expenses for these investigators.
